data.meta_site_name: Ambrose Funeral Home and Cremation Services, Inc.
data.text:
Gloria “Lorraine” Weber, age 81, passed away on October 12, 2016 in Columbia, Maryland. Gloria was born to Thomas Leroy Marsh and Sadie Marie Marsh (nee Beadenkopff) on February 1, 1935 in Baltimore, Maryland. She is the beloved wife of the late Norman Carroll Weber; loving step daughter of George William Wharry; dear mother of Paul W. Rutter and his wife Renette, Keith L. Rutter and his wife Teresa, Kevin G. Rutter, Karen L. Klinedinst and her husband Paul, Robert B. Rutter, Carol A. Orndoff and her husband Joseph, Norman E. Weber and his wife Melinda, and the late Lenora M. Beaghan; cherished grandmother of 15 grandchildren and 5 great-grandchildren; devoted sister of Kenneth D. Marsh, Robert Benson Marsh, Beverly Ann Rassen and the late William Marsh, Edward Lee Marsh, and Lois Marie Criner.

Family members and friends will honor Gloria’s life at the family owned and operated AMBROSE FUNERAL HOME, INC., Arbutus, on Tuesday, 10/18/16 from 3-5pm & 7-9pm where a funeral service will follow on Wednesday, 10/19/16 beginning at 9:45am. Interment to follow in Garrison Forest Veterans Cemetery.
